General.Name: Havanna Holding SA
General.Description: Havanna Holding S.A. operates a chain of coffee shops in Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Spain, the United States, Paraguay, Peru, El Salvador, Colombia, Venezuela, and Ecuador. The company's cafes offer various coffee; and alfajores, havannets, dulce de leche, mini-line, caramel sauce, haireados, lattes, struck, bars, cookies, chocolates, and caramel products. Havanna Holding S.A. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
